tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE guest_check_in_out (
  guest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  check_in_time TIMESTAMP,
  check_out_time TIMESTAMP,
  guest_name VARCHAR(100),
  room_number INT,
  booking_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE reservations (
  reservation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  guest_id INT,
  reservation_date DATE,
  room_number INT,
  status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE reservations (
    reservation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    guest_id INT NOT NULL,
    room_number INT NOT NULL,
    check_in_date DATE NOT NULL,
    check_out_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE guests (
  guest_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  guest_name VARCHAR(50),
  check_in_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  check_out_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE rooms (
  room_number INT PRIMARY KEY,
  room_type VARCHAR(20),
  availability BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE staff (
  staff_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  staff_name VARCHAR(50),
  role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE check_ins (
  check_in_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  guest_id UUID REFERENCES guests(guest_id),
  room_number INT REFERENCES rooms(room_number),
  check_in_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE check_outs (
  check_out_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  guest_id UUID REFERENCES guests(guest_id),
  room_number INT REFERENCES rooms(room_number),
  check_out_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
